definition: collection of documents/library/book series/sequence of data, esp. genome

sentences.english: The bacterial artificial chromosome (BAG) library is the basic tool for the genome research.
sentences.chinese: 基因组文库是进行基因组研究的基础工作之一。

sentences.english: Genome library methodology was adopted for cloning of endoglucanase encoding genes.
sentences.chinese: 内切葡聚糖酶基因的克隆采取基因文库方法。

sentences.english: This book is now only statue in Japan by the Court for possession of a residual copy library.
sentences.chinese: 此书在日本现在只有尊经阁文库藏的一个残抄本。

sentences.english: The research was published online in the Archives of Internal Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发表在《内科学文献》在线文库中。

sentences.english: The SAP Library is a comprehensive collection of information about the relevant SAP products.
sentences.chinese: SAP文库全面搜集了关于SAP产品的相关信息。

sentences.english: The invention concerns constructs and libraries comprising antibody surrogate light chain sequences.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及包含抗体替代轻链序列的构建体和文库。

sentences.english: Check it out for yourself here, from Cornell University Library.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在康奈尔大学实验室的论文库中找到它。

definition: a series of books/a collection of books
omnibus/complete works (of a writer or artist)
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
Baidu Knows, online Q & A forum, zhidao.baidu.com
